live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.

27137.summary: Some customers in the Varsity View & Marlton areas of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27137.title: Oct 12 – Winnipeg (Varsity View & Marlton) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
